metadata.Title: CVE-2018-19882 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - negligible.
metadata.Description: In Artifex MuPDF 1.14.0, the svg_run_image function in svg/svg-run.c allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (href_att NULL pointer dereference and application crash) via a crafted svg file, as demonstrated by mupdf-gl.

notes.Note: ebarretto> Negligable security impact, crash in CLI tool

criterions.comment: mupdf: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
